## Add Interactive Map

```{r}
leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addProviderTiles('Esri.OceanBasemap') %>% 
  addRasterImage(aragonite_clipped, colors = binpal) %>% 
  addLegend(
    pal = binpal, values = seq(1,3),
    title = "Aragonite Saturation State")
```
